--- Pacifix / Swoop / Crossroads ---

Pacifix's mask stretches downward in surprise, "I, I would ve 
honoured if you came Grimlock," said Pacifix, not wanting to upset 
him anymore, "Your battle skills and expertise would be extremely 
profitable to have along." He pauses, his facial expression changes 
to one of defense, "Grimlock, there are more ways that outright 
violence to solve problems that could be solved with wor---" Pacifix 
is interupted, as another Dinobot who had arrived late as a 
spectator, but early enough to hear Grimlock, speaks up.

Swoop enters the Council chamber, and listens to Grimlock's 
inspiring speach. "If Grimlock go then Swoop go too. Dinobots deal 
with all kinds of stuff. Grimlock Dinobot leader, if Grimlock go, then 
Dinobots go as well." Swoop joins Grimlock, "Grimlock, put sword 
away you make other's nervous."

Pacifix looks at the two Dinobots, and nods. He returns his 
attention to the Council, "I do not mind if the Dinobots come along, 
yet I leave the decision up to the Council." Pacifix frowns at the 
gutted podium.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Crossroads stops by his quarters, and picks up all that he will 
bring along. He looks about his room for the last time, "Farewell," 
He grabs his strategy papers and journals, puts them into a 
compartment, and exits the building. He transforms into 'cycle 
mode and heads toward the secret ship. He opens a commlink to 
JetV, "JetV, this is Crossroads, what's up? I'm heading to the ship. 
Make sure that you're not seen by any Preds or 'Cons when you 
travel there... all would be lost if that were to happen. Crossroads 
out." He screams along the freeway, and cuts off a cuts off a Pred 
freighter, showing them his feelings. The unkind words coming from 
the freighter proved that the feelings were mutual.


On 16 May 2001, at 22:02, robertdahl wrote:

> Ironhide nods, as do many Autobots in aproval, but one can be heard in
> an uproar. Ironhide turns his head to his side, and looks down, to see
> the centre of the disturbance. One very large Autobot had already
> smashed his desk, and was standing at his full height, very upset.
> Ironhide knew he was in for trouble, "Is there a problem Grimlock?" He
> asked, knowing there is. "YES THERE PROBLEM" Grimlock yelled, his
> voice echoing very clearly throughout all of Iocon. "THIS BULLSHIT.
> YOU SEND ROOKIES TO FIGHT IN WAR THAT AFFECT WHOLE GALAXY, EVEN WHOLE
> TIME. YOU SEND A PACIFIST!!" he declared in rage, as he pointed a
> finger at Pacifix. He pulled out his energon sword, and in one swipe,
> cleaved his whole rows podium straight in half. Grimlock stopped and
> looked up at the main council, his sword at his side, energy
> shimmering off it.
> 
> Ironhide sighed, how did he get a weapon in this room. This wasnt the
> first time this happened. "Grimlock, you know that if one of us goes
> the Predacons will be on to us," He said calmly. "None of us can go".
> 
> Grimlock looked back up, then crossed his arms, his sword just above
> his head, still shimmering, the energy intesifing the look of rage in
> his crimson eyes. "Then I go to earth to" he said quietly, and he was
> almost not heard with the large amount of gasps that escaped around
> the room.
>
